'''[[Cultural evolution]]''' is [[cultural change]] viewed from an [[Evolution|evolutionary perspective]].
It may also refer to: * [[Cultural selection theory]], studies of cultural change modelled on [[evolutionary biology]] * [[Dual inheritance theory|Dual-inheritance theory]], a specific framework for studying cultural evolution * [[Memetics]], neo-Darwinist view of the transmission of cultural traits * [[Social evolution]], the evolution of social behaviour * [[Sociocultural evolution]], a historic theory of social change based on [[Social progress|linear progress]]
==See also== * [[Cultural revolution]] * [[Iranian Cultural Revolution]] * [[Culture war]]
